desc: worked on several projects, including the development of an ERP system to manage product status and the order cycle. I utilized the MERN stack technologies (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js) to build this system.

have developed, solved problems, and deployed over 300 educational and interactive experiments on the main site using JavaScript and its related frameworks. worked on the development of the Vlaby website, added some features and designs, and solved problems

Through extensive front-end web development experience across numerous company projects, I have become a highly skilled and confident designer and implementer of visually appealing, responsive, and interactive user experiences for exceptional customer-facing web applications.
